metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in dlopen in libvdpau before 1.1.1 allows local users to gain privileges via the VDPAU_DRIVER environment variable.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvdpau1 - 0.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvdpau package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7-1ubuntu0.1').
